meanings.definition: The branch of psychiatry concerned with the prevention and treatment of mental disorders in children and adolescents.
meanings.sent1: Orthopsychiatry helps children with mental problems.
meanings.sent2: Doctors in orthopsychiatry work to treat young people's mental disorders.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatry team made sure the kids' minds were as strong as their bodies.
meanings.sent4: In the world of mental health, orthopsychiatry is the knight in shining armor for kids.
meanings.sent5: The colorful posters in the orthopsychiatry clinic made the children feel safe and understood.

meanings.definition: The practice of promoting mental health and preventing mental illness in young people.
meanings.sent1: Orthopsychiatry focuses on keeping kids mentally healthy.
meanings.sent2: Schools often incorporate orthopsychiatry techniques to support students' mental well-being.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatry workshop at the school taught kids how to keep their minds happy.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against mental illness, orthopsychiatry is the shield for the youth.
meanings.sent5: The colorful brochures about mental health in orthopsychiatry were a hit with the teenagers.
